meta.description: The lawsuit suggests there has been an unprecedented rise in vaccine injuries, and that data reveals an association with increasing death from both COVID & non-COVID causes in the vaccinated.

title: A Team of International Scientists & Leading Medical Professionals Are Taking Pfizer To Court In South Africa
cleaned_text:
Our use of cookies

We use necessary cookies to make our site work. We also set performance and functionality cookies that help us make improvements by measuring traffic on our site. For more detailed information about the cookies we use, please see our privacy policy

opengraph.title: A Team of International Scientists & Leading Medical Professionals Are Taking Pfizer To Court In South Africa
opengraph.description: The lawsuit suggests there has been an unprecedented rise in vaccine injuries, and that data reveals an association with increasing death from both COVID & non-COVID causes in the vaccinated.
